display_long_description:
Jump headfirst into the wild world of bartending! Run your own bar and get cozy with all sorts of bartender gadgets and recipes. In this Early Access Demo, you can mix and master different cocktail recipes.

Once the game is fully released, you can manage a bar solo or team up with friends, serve up drinks, and rake in the cash. Use your hard-earned dough to pimp out your bar or even buy a swanky new one.

But hey, just like in a real life, things can get pretty hectic. Don’t keep the customers waiting too long, or they’ll get cranky, and that’s bad for business. Keep them happy and your profits will soar! So, get ready to hustle and find the perfect balance between speed and precision to make it big in this boozy adventure!

We would love to get your Feedback on this!

Join our Discord or send us an email!!
Discord: https://discord.gg/Ww4gY3Hf
EMail: business.virtualvisions@virtual-visions.net
